title: Implement Execution confirmation
description:
Success/failure messages after execution.

## UI
```tsx
{executionComplete && (
  <Alert variant="success">
    <AlertTitle>Changes Executed!</AlertTitle>
    <AlertDescription>
      {results.successful} recommendations applied successfully.
      {results.failed > 0 && ` ${results.failed} failed.`}
    </AlertDescription>
  </Alert>
)}
```

## Demo Flow
1. User approves recommendations
2. Click "Execute All Approved"
3. Show loading spinner
4. Display success confirmation
5. (Optional) Celebration animation
